title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Business Interpretation and Translation

context.prior_knowledge: Essential business terminology and intermediate-level foreign language proficiency
context.additional_context: A customized online education course designed to enhance workplace applicability for working professionals

learning_goals: One can accurately translate key expressions occurring in business meetings and negotiation scenarios
Can perform practical interpretation considering intercultural communication differences.
Can sustain self-directed learning at least twice a week using microlearning modules provided in mobile environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
